comments.body:
I don't feel like we need such explicit comments in code samples.

What made you add it?
As someone training a team of mixed-skill-level and mixed-scala-experience developers, I can say that cross-links like this are really useful.

Hi @alexandru I am not a big fan of comments either as they might to be changed along with
codebase. Better when code speaks for itself but in this case comment is to help understand
where `ContextShift` is used. 

I thought It helps when I directly jump into `MVar` concept even with little knowledge of cats-effect and scala. 

Let me know I can remove the comment if you think other ways :)
